```{r Read Heart Data}
data <- read.table("http://www-stat.stanford.edu/~tibs/ElemStatLearn/datasets/SAheart.data",
	sep=",",head=T,row.names=1)
DF <- data.frame(data)
X <- apply(as.matrix.noquote(DF),2,as.numeric)
ystr <- "chd"
y <- X[, colnames(X)==ystr]
X <- X[, colnames(X)!=ystr]
X <- X[, colnames(X)!="famhist"]
alpha <- 1e-10
tol <- 1e-6
temp <- gd_logistic_regression(X,y,alpha,tol)
```
